front.title: An Application Protocol for the Reliable Data Transfer over Multicast Subnetworks and under EMCON Restrictions

abstract.t: P_Mul is a proposal for an application protocol for the transfer of messages (e.g. email, files) using a connectionless transport protocol. The objectives of this protocol are first to take advantage of the bandwidth saving feature of using the multicast service as supported by modern computer networks and second to allow message transfer under EMCON conditions.
